name: NSToolbarItemGroup.SelectionMode
desc: A value that indicates how a grouped toolbar item selects its subitems.

items.name: case momentary
items.desc: The system temporarily highlights the select group item when the user selects the item.

items.name: case selectAny
items.desc: The system toggles a highlight on any item selected.

items.name: case selectOne
items.desc: The system displays a highlighted mode on the most recent item selected.
